    • addStudentsToDining

      public void addStudentsToDining(StudentsContainer container)
      This method moves students and checks also the professors and coins
      Parameters:
      container - The students added to current player's dining room

    • removeStudentsFromDining

      public void removeStudentsFromDining(StudentsContainer container) throws NoProfChangeException
      This method also checks for professors, so if you lose students you can lose their professor too
      Parameters:
      container - The students needed to be removed from currentPlayer dining room
      Throws:
      NoProfChangeException - When there is a draw situation

      Parameters:

      Parameters:
      cloud - Cloud from which you remove students and move them to currentPlayer's entrance

      Moves Students from the entrance to a specific Island
      Parameters:
      island - Island to where you move students
      container - Students you have picked from currentPlayer's entrance
